faction_profile.name: 장강수로채 (Yangtze River Water Fortress / 長江水路寨)

location.base: Dongting Lake (Dongjeong-ho / 洞庭湖) - Hidden fortress within the vast lake.
location.territory: Controls all shipping lanes on the major rivers.

heritage.nature: Pirates / Water Bandits turned into a massive cartel.

status.political_role: Economic powerhouse (tolls/smuggling). Rivals with Nokrim (Mountain Bandits).

combat_style.summary: Invincible on water. Specialists in swimming, breath holding, and fighting on rocking boats.

signature_ultimate.name: 분수결 (Water Parting Formula)
signature_ultimate.description: Technique to cut through water and move freely underwater.

role: The obstacle for any journey involving a river crossing.
Smugglers of illegal goods or people.
Classic rivalry: 'Mountains have Nokrim, Waters have Surochae'.
